workflow.name: Generate personalized sales outreach from LinkedIn job signals with Apify & Google Gemini
workflow.description:
![Overview.PNG](fileId:2762)

## This n8n template from [Intuz](https://www.intuz.com/) provides a complete and automated solution for identifying high-intent leads from LinkedIn job postings and automatically generating personalized outreach emails.

## Disclaimer
Community nodes are used in this workflow.

## Who‚Äôs this workflow for?
- B2B Sales Teams & SDRs
- Recruitment Agencies & Tech Recruiters
- Startup Founders
- Growth Marketing Teams

## How it works
**1. Scrape Hiring Signals:** The workflow starts by using an Apify scraper to find companies actively hiring for specific roles on LinkedIn (e.g., ‚ÄúML Engineer‚Äù).

**2. Filter & Qualify Companies:** It automatically filters the results based on your criteria (e.g., company size, industry) to create a high-quality list of target accounts.

**3. Find Decision-Makers:** For each qualified company, it uses Apollo.io to find key decision-makers (VPs, Directors, etc.) and enrich their profiles with verified email addresses using user‚Äôs Apollo API.

**4. Build a Lead List:** All the enriched lead data‚Äîcontact name, title, email, company info‚Äîis systematically added to a Google Sheet.

**5. Generate AI-Powered Emails:** The workflow then feeds each lead‚Äôs data to a Google Gemini AI model, which drafts a unique, personalized cold email that references the specific job the company is hiring for.

**6. Complete the Outreach List:** Finally, the AI-generated subject line and email body are saved back into the Google Sheet, leaving you with a fully prepared, hyper-targeted outreach campaign.

## Setup Instructions
**1. Apify Configuration:** 
- Connect your Apify account in the Run the LinkedIn Job Scraper node.
- You‚Äôll need an apify scrapper, we have used [this scrapper](https://apify.com/curious_coder/linkedin-jobs-scraper)
- In the Custom Body field, paste the URL of your target LinkedIn Jobs search query.

**2. Data Enrichment:**
- Connect your account API of data providers like Clay, Hunter, Apollo, etc. using HTTP Header Auth in the Get Targeted Personnel and Email Finder nodes.

**3. Google Gemini AI:**
- Connect your Google Gemini (or PaLM) API account in the Google Gemini Chat Model node.

**4. Google Sheets Setup:**
- Connect your Google Sheets account.
- Create a spreadsheet and update the Document ID and Sheet Name in the three Google Sheets nodes to match your own.

**5. Activate Workflow:**
- Click ‚ÄúExecute workflow‚Äù to run the entire lead generation and email-writing process on demand.


## Connect with us:
- Website: https://www.intuz.com/services
- Email: getstarted@intuz.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/intuz
- Get Started: https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/intuz

## For Custom Workflow Automation
Click here- [Get Started](https://www.intuz.com/get-started)

workflow.name: Automate Sales Outreach with LinkedIn Job Signals, Apify, Apollo.io & Google Gemini

nodes.name: Validates Email Id and Email Content

parameters.text:
=Act as an expert B2B copywriter specializing in cold outreach for tech recruitment services.


Your task is to write a personalized, friendly, and professional cold email. The goal is to get the attention of a busy executive by offering a clear solution to their current hiring needs.


BACKGROUND & CONTEXT:

Our Service: We provide pre-vetted, skilled remote tech talent (AI/ML Engineers, DevOps, etc.).

Target Company: US-based, under 250 employees.

Target Persona: CEO, CTO, Head of Engineering, VP of Operations.

Trigger Event: The target company is actively hiring for a specific tech role.

Key Value Proposition:

Save significant time in the hiring process.

Save 30-40% on budget compared to a direct, in-house hire.


INPUT VARIABLES (You will use these to personalize the email):

{{ $json.Company }}: The name of the company.

{{ $json['Job Title'] }}: The specific job title they are hiring for (e.g., "AI Engineer").

{{ $json.Occupation }}: The job title of the person I'm emailing (e.g., "CTO").


INSTRUCTIONS & CONSTRAINTS:


1. Subject Line:

Generate catchy subject line.

Each subject line must be 7-8 words maximum.

They should be intriguing and directly related to their hiring needs. Examples: "Your AI Engineer role," "An idea for your engineering team," "Filling your {{ $json['Job Title'] }} role."


2. Email Body:

Write the email body only. Do not include a salutation like "Hi {{ $json['First Name'] }}".

The email must start with the exact phrase: "Saw that {{ $json.Company }} is hiring for a {{ $json['Job Title'] }}."

The tone must be professional, friendly, and easy to understand.

Crucially, avoid high-level marketing jargon or complex AI-related terminology. Keep the language simple and direct.

Focus the message on the two main benefits: filling the role faster and more affordably. Mention the 30-40% savings.

The total word count for the body must be under 120 words.

End with a soft, low-pressure call-to-action, such as asking if they are open to exploring alternative ways to build their team

parameters.content:
## ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Start Workflow


**Manually triggers the entire lead generation process.**

## Run the LinkedIn Job Scraper from Apify


Scrape LinkedIn Job Postings:

Uses Apify to find companies that are actively hiring based on a specific job search URL.

## Get dataset Items

Collect Scraped Data:

Retrieves the list of job postings and company details scraped by Apify.

## Checks Company Size < 250

Filter by Company Size:

Only allows companies with fewer than 250 employees to pass through.
## Rmeove Duplicate Entries
## Rmeove HR Related Companies
## Prepare Final Company Details
## Check domain Existence
## Limit Company Search

## Apollo Get Targeted Personnel


Find Decision-Makers:

Searches Apollo.io using the company domain to find key contacts (VPs, Directors, etc.).

## Sanitising Person Details

Clean Person Data:

Structures the contact details and removes duplicates to create a clean list of people.

## Apollo Email Finder

Find Verified Emails:

For each contact, this node asks Apollo.io to find their professional email address.

## Sanitising Email Details

Isolate Email Data:

Prepares the found email addresses for merging

## Merge Data

Combine Data Streams:

Merges the company data, the person data, and the email data together.

## Structuring Complete Details of Person

Create Final Lead Profile:

Combines all three data streams into a single, complete lead record for each person.

## Save Leads to Google Sheets

Appends each complete lead profile as a new row in the master spreadsheet.

## Fetching Leads Data

Read Leads for AI:

Reads the newly saved leads from the sheet to begin the email generation phase.

## Validates Email Id and Email Content

Check Before AI Processing:

Filters for leads that have a valid email but do NOT yet have a generated subject or body.

## Apply Final Filter

Applies a final condition before sending data to the AI model (e.g., for batching or testing).

## Lead Email Generator

AI Prompt Engine:

Takes the lead data, combines it with the prompt, and sends it to the Gemini model.

## Google Gemini Chat Model

Google Gemini Model:

The AI model that actually writes the email based on the provided data and instructions.

## Update Sheet with Email

Update Sheet with AI Email:

Saves the generated subject and email body back into the correct row for the lead in Google Sheets.

## Structured Output Parser

Format AI Output:

Takes the raw text from Gemini and structures it into clean JSON (subject and email_body).

## Need Help? 

We develop tailored workflow to save youe valuable time. Should you have any questions or wish to explore more custom automation solutions, we would be happy to connect


### Email: getstarted@intuz.com
### Website: https://www.intuz.com/

main.node: Validates Email Id and Email Content

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
